wikipedia_page.main: Henry Bendelack Hewetson was an English surgeon, and also an active naturalist. He wrote books and articles on medical issues and about nature.

response: * Henry Bendelack Hewetson (1850–1899), ophthalmic and Aural surgeon
* Henry Bendelack Hewetson, ophtalmic and Aural surgeon
* Henry Bendelack Hewetson (1850-1899) - ophthalmologist and naturalist
